text:
Comma.ai | Software Engineer | San Francisco | ONSITE, INTERNS, comma.ai

Come win self driving cars. 6 open positions and intern spots are available. Looking for people who have done well at math competitions (USAMO, IMO, PUTNAM), competition programming (ACM, USACO, codejam, topcoder), science fairs (ISEF, STS), or capture the flag (DEFCON, secuinside, GITS).

Send an email over with your resume and Github link (if you have one) to givemeajob at comma.ai.
